Package model

Class WordFinder

java.lang.Object
model.WordFinder
public class WordFinder
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the methods to find all English words in a given String
Author:
Jhonny Ocampo

  • Method Details

    • findAllEnglishWords

      public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> findAllEnglishWords​(java.lang.String word)
      Find all English words in a given string. For example, if the string "working" is given, it will return the words "work", "king", "row", "ring", "know", among others. Generates all possible subsets of the given string and these subsets must have at least one vowel. Then, it permutes each generated subset and validates if the subset is an English word. A collection of String is returned with all English words found.
      Parameters:
      word - string used to find all subsets that are English words. Letters can be lowercase or uppercase.
      Returns:
      a collection of String that contains all English words found without duplicates. All generated words are lowercase. An empty collection is returned if the parameter word is null or no English words are found.

    • generateCombinations

      private void generateCombinations​(char[] word, int maskOfVowels)
      Generates all possible subsets of an array of characters and these subsets must have at least one vowel. For every subset generated, method generatePermutations(char[] word) is called.
      Parameters:
      word - array of characters to be combined.
      maskOfVowels - a bitmask representing the positions of the vowels in the array of characters.

    • generatePermutations

      private void generatePermutations​(char[] word)
      Generates all possible permutations of the characters in the given string. The Heap's algorithm is implemented. For every permutation generated, method processWord(String word) is called.
      Parameters:
      word - array of characters to be permuted.

    • swap

      private void swap​(char[] arrayToSwap, int indexA, int indexB)
      Swap the character of position indexA for the character of position indexB in the array arrayToSwap.
      Parameters:
      arrayToSwap - array of char to be swapped.
      indexA - index of the character to be swapped for the character of the index indexB.
      indexB - index of the character to be swapped for the character of the index indexA.

    • processWord

      private void processWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Call the method Dictionary.isEnglishWord(word) to validate if the given string is an English word. If so, then the word will be added in a HashSet that contains all the words found.
      Parameters:
      word - string to be evaluated if it is an English word. If so, it will be stored in a HashSet.
